title: Rise 'n Shine Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Casual place, located in Merrimon Square, for breakfast or lunch. Offers several vegan choices including a roasted potato bowl and a TLT (BLT with tempeh instead of bacon), plus several sides. Uses local and organic products. Dynamite Coffee Roasters supply a shade-raised and fair-trade organic Sumatra coffee.
